news.title: SPADE 3.2 Released
news.description: We're excited to announce the release of SPADE 3.2 with improved performance, new behavior types, and expanded documentation.

news.title: New Tutorial Series
news.description: Check out our new comprehensive tutorial series covering advanced topics in multi-agent system design with SPADE.

news.title: Community Spotlight
news.description: Learn how researchers at the Technical University of Valencia are using SPADE to simulate smart city environments.
